title: YSenseAI v4.5-Beta: Ethical AI Training Data Platform with Story-First UX
description: YSenseAI is an open-source platform for collecting AI training data ethically, with consent, attribution, and fair compensation. Features story-first AI-native UX, Z-Protocol v2.0 ethical framework, cryptographic attribution (SHA-256 + DID), and training-optimized quality metrics. Built with Python/Streamlit, integrates Claude (Anthropic) and Qwen (Alibaba Cloud) APIs.
notes: YSenseAI v4.5-Beta implements the Z-Protocol v2.0 ethical framework (DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.17072168) for AI training data collection. This release features story-first AI-native UX with collaborative distillation, cryptographic attribution (SHA-256 + DID), 6 training optimization quality metrics, and GDPR-compliant privacy protection. Open source under MIT License (code) and CC BY-SA 4.0 (Z-Protocol framework).
